1.content: I think I'd want to explore the life where I became a marine biologist. I've always wondered what it would be like to work with dolphins and study ocean ecosystems. The idea of spending my days underwater discovering new species seems magical.

For me, it would definitely be the life where I moved to Japan and became a chef. I've always been fascinated by Japanese cuisine and culture. I imagine myself running a small ramen shop in Tokyo, perfecting recipes passed down through generations.
